title: Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou
alternative_title: Daily Lives of High School Boys, 男子高校生の日常
description: The original gag comedy manga follows the humorous yet “realistic” everyday life of Tadakuni, Hidenori, Yoshitake, and other students at a boys’ high school.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
